Articles.Content:
Hi.

I'm relatively new. I started a few weeks ago, and have been playing the career mode.

I just got a working space plane after quite a few... unreliable attempts.

Here's a successful orbit and reentry
http://imgur.com/a/sp9fA

I've a lot more parts to unlock so, eventually I'll get to the other planets.

 

The mods look interesting but I can't seem to figure out some of them. Kerbal Engineer works for me, just dropping it in the .\Kerbal Space Program\GameData folder, but some of the other mods like Ambient light or toolbar don't seem to work.

I'm running the GoG.com version of KSP, not the Steam version - so I'm not sure if that changes anything.

 

Loving the game so far. Sailing through space with every movement based on gravity is just, amazing.

Hello beomagi and welcome to the KSP Forums!

Brilliant work on the spaceplane!  A functional spaceplane is very challenging.

Some mods require that you look inside the zip and find a gamedata folder in there and copy the contents of that to your own gamedata folder.

Happy landings!
That's a great-looking spaceplane! I've never been much good at them.
Playing for a few weeks and already has a working SSTO. I've been playing for 2+ years and have barely even gotten into space with a plane!
Thanks guys  still working on my tech tree - I've yet to unlock rcs, docking clamps, medium landing gear and greater and whatever it is that makes kerbal's jetpacks fly...
Welcome to the forums, and great work on the spaceplane! My patience always seems to run out with all the tweaking that goes in to making one

Welcome to the forums, and nice work on that spaceplane. Have fun!

 

Edited September 8, 2016 by Lo Var Lachland
